author: tpena
title: Infrastructure & Blockchain
description:
Corruption impeding development. Using blockchain as a fool proof process in development. 
The aim is to decentralize using blockchain.
solution: Create a protocol using Blockchain that can be used to plan, develop, and close-out projects at the local level - smart contracts.
experience: 18 yrs. Engineering, 2 plus yrs. capital planning & asset and 8 yrs. program management.
